1.name: Reckless Dodge
1.desc: Damage foes at end of a dodge roll.

2.name: Building Momentum
2.desc: Burst skills restore 15 endurance on hit.

3.name: Stick and Move
3.desc: Get a 10% damage bonus when endurance is not full.

1.name: Death from Above
1.desc: Damage and launch foes when you take falling damage. Take 50% less damage from falling.

2.name: Restorative Strength
2.desc: Using a heal skill remove conditions.

3.name: Physical Training
3.desc: Physical skills deal more damage based on how much adrenaline you have. Physical skills recharge 20% faster.

1.name: Body Blow
1.desc: Stuns, Dazes, Knockbacks, Pull, Pushes and Launches inflict bleeding and weakness.

2.name: Forceful Greatsword
2.desc: Gain might on a critical hit with a greatsword or spear. Greatsword and spear skills deal 10% more damage and recharge 20% faster.

3.name: Great Fortitude
3.desc: A 10% of power is given as a bonus to vitality.

1.name: Berserker’s Power
1.desc: Gain a damage boost when you use a burst skill. Boost power increases based how much adrenaline you have built.

2.name: Distracting Strikes
2.desc: Gain might and cause confusion when you interrupt a foes skill.

3.name: Axe Mastery
3.desc: Critical hits with an axe gain extra adrenaline. Gain +150 Ferocity for each axe you are wielding. Reduce recharge on axe skills by 20%.

1.name: Precise Strikes
1.desc: 33% chance to cause bleeding on critical hits.

2.name: Unsuspecting Foe
2.desc: Increased 50% critical-hit chance against stunned foes.

3.name: Attack of Opportunity
3.desc: Increases 10% damage to bleeding foes and Bleeds you apply last 50% longer.

1.name: Berserker’s Fury
1.desc: Gain adrenaline while in combat. Gain Fury when you strike a foe below a health threshold (25%).

2.name: Signet Mastery
2.desc: Signets grant a stacking Precision buff on use and recharge 20% faster. Cast Signet of Might whenever you strike a foe below the health threshold (50%).

3.name: Deep Strike
3.desc: Fury you apply also grants 150 condition damage.

1.name: Rending Strikes
1.desc: You have a 33% chance to cause vulnerability and gain swiftness on critical hits.

2.name: Opportunist
2.desc: Gain fury when you immobilize a target.

3.name: Blademaster
3.desc: Increases sword critical chance by 10%. Effect doubled vs bleeding foes. Reduce recharge on sword skills by 20%.

1.name: Burst Precision
1.desc: Burst skills have 100% increased critical chance.

2.name: Furious
2.desc: Critical hits grant bonus adrenaline and gain a stacking condition damage buff.

3.name: Dual Wielding
3.desc: Deal 5% more damage and your attack speed is increased by 15% when wielding a sword, axe or mace in your offhand.

1.name: Thick Skin
1.desc: Gain extra armor while your health is above the threshold (90%).

2.name: Adrenal Health
2.desc: Regenerate health based on adrenaline level.

3.name: Spiked Armor
3.desc: Gain retaliation when you block or are struck by a critical hit. Retaliation gives you 150 bonus toughness.

1.name: Shield Master
1.desc: Reflect missiles whenever you are blocking. Gain might when you block an attack. Shield skills recharge 20% faster.

2.name: Dogged March
2.desc: Incoming movement-impeding conditions have their durations reduced. Gain regeneration when you are affected by one of these conditions.

3.name: Armored Attack
3.desc: Gain 7% power based on your toughness.

1.name: Last Stand
1.desc: Activates Balanced Stance when you are dazed, knocked down, launched, pushed back, pulled, or stunned. increases stance duration by 25% and gain vigor when using a stance.

2.name: Cull the Weak
2.desc: Increases 5% damage to wakened foes. Striking a foe below the 25% health threshold inflicts weakness.

3.name: Cleansing Ire
3.desc: Gain adrenaline when hit. Remove a condition for every bar of adrenaline spent when you hit with a burst skill.

1.name: Sundering Mace
1.desc: Mace skills deal 10% more damage and cause vulnerability to disabled foes. Reduces 20% recharge on mace skills.

2.name: Defy Pain
2.desc: Activate Endure Pain when you are struck while below the health threshold (25%)

3.name: Rousing Resilience
3.desc: Gain toughness when you break out a stun.

1.name: Determined Revival
1.desc: Gain extra toughness per level while reviving.

2.name: Reviver’s Might
2.desc: Grant might to nearby allies when you revive someone.

3.name: Inspiring Presence
3.desc: Boon duration and outgoing healing increased by 10%.

1.name: Leg Specialist
1.desc: Immobilize a target when you cripple them with a skill.

2.name: Quick Breathing
2.desc: Reduce 20% recharge on warhorn skills. Warhorn skills convert conditions to boons.

3.name: Empowered
3.desc: Increases 1% damage for every boon on you.

1.name: Shrug It Off
1.desc: Use Shake it Off automatically when you have a number of conditions on you.

2.name: Burning Arrows
2.desc: Dual shot causes burning and Longbow skills recharge 20% faster.

3.name: Empower Allies
3.desc: Increase power for nearby allies.

1.name: Powerful Synergy
1.desc: When you activate a leap combo finisher it activates twice.

2.name: Vigorous Shouts
2.desc: Shouts heal allies and grant adrenaline. Shouts recharge 20% faster,

3.name: Phalanx Strength
3.desc: When you grant yourself might, grant it to nearby allies as well.

1.name: Versatile Rage
1.desc: Gain 5 adrenaline on weapon swap.

2.name: Fast Hands
2.desc: Weapon-swapping recharges 5s faster.

3.name: Versatile Power
3.desc: Gain might on weapon swap. Burst skills recharge 15% faster.

1.name: Crack Shot
1.desc: Rifle and harpoon gun shots pierce. Reduces recharge on rifle and harpoon gun skills by 20%.

2.name: Warrior’s Sprint
2.desc: Run 25% faster while wielding melee weapons. Movement skills break immobilize.

3.name: Vengeful Return
3.desc: Vengeance has a 100% increased chance to rally.

1.name: Inspiring Battle Standard
1.desc: Banners also grant regeneration to allies.

2.name: Destruction of the Empowered
2.desc: Gain 3% bonus damage per boon on your target.

3.name: Brawler’s Recovery
3.desc: Remove conditions when you swap weapons

1.name: Merciless Hammer
1.desc: Hammer damage is increased by 20% when a foe is disabled. Reduces recharge by 20% on hammer skills.

2.name: Burst Mastery
2.desc: Burst skills deal 7% more damage and restore adrenaline on use.

3.name: Heightened Focus
3.desc: Gain quickness when you strike a foe that is below the health threshold (50%).
